text: The Ovalia Egg Chair was designed by Danish industrial designer Henrik Thor- Larsen and first displayed in 1968. It resembles Eero Aarnio's Ball Chair, but has narrower proportions. It featured in the films Men in Black and Men in Black II.Men in Black II poster == References == == External links == Chair's official website Category:Chairs Category:Products introduced in 1968
title: Ovalia Egg Chair
